doc.field: This series contains volumes illustrated by Cronin, including two copies of Joseph Rodman Drakes's poem The Culprit Fay, a copy of a limited edition Bibliography Relating to the Works Hand Illustrated by David Edward Cronin, and The Vest Mansion: Its Historical and Romantic Associations As Confederate and Union Headquarters, 1862-1865, written and illustrated by Cronin.
Bibliography Relating to the Works Hand Illustrated by David Edward Cronin
The Vest Mansion: Its Historical and Romantic Associations As Confederate and Union Headquarters, 1862-1865
Bibliography Relating to the Works Hand Illustrated by David Edward Cronin
The Vest Mansion: Its Historical and Romantic Associations As Confederate and Union Headquarters, 1862-1865
